attributes.action: make Female Jelly Wrestling an Olympic sport in the 2012 London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Female Jelly Wrestling is one of the most physically demanding sports in the world in which Britain excels at. If this sport was brought to the 2012 Olympics, Britain would be seen as a world leader in the promotion of this underrated sport.  Bringing it to the Olympics would also help to improve TV viewing figures in the critical post-pub closing time slot as there aren't enough jelly covered, bikini-clad female Olympic athletes.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
